routerUpdateGuidance.principle: Route to macro skills by (stage, channel, user intent). Old fine-grained skills should no longer be directly selectable.
recommendedSkillSelectionOrder: If user is answering/asking for structured questions -> interact.questionsPack
If user wants to create/update an element spec or method -> elements.specManager
If user wants tasks breakdown/refine -> tasks.taskBuilder
If user wants schedule/milestones/install plan -> plan.productionPlan
If user wants client-facing quote text/email -> money.quoteWriter
If user wants printing spec -> printing.printManager
If user wants printing file validation -> printing.fileQA
If user wants Trello export -> export.trelloSync
routerUpdateGuidance.stageHandling: Pass stage as input.stage (ideation|planning|solutioning|printing|retro). Macro skill prompts should branch internally based on stage.
